name: Sample Item
description: This is a sample structure of an item. This must not be loaded into the database.

name: Wood
description: A basic material needed for every uses.

name: Stick
description: A small stick. Can be used to craft all sort of tools.

name: Wood Pickaxe
description: A fragile pickaxe. It can only mine a small amount of things before breaking apart.

name: Leaf
description: The green-looking thing on pretty much most of the trees.

name: Hibiscus
description: A cool-looking flower. Can be used to make potions.

name: Tulip
description: A pink flower. Can be used to make potions.

name: Rose
description: A red flower. Can be used to make potions.

name: Lucky Clover
description: A 4-leaf clover. It's quite rare for you to encounter this. Consider yourself lucky for today.

name: Rotten Flesh
description: A disgusting drop from killing zombies. This can be used to brew potions.

name: Spider Eye
description: A drop from killing spiders. This can be used to brew potions.

name: Gunpowder
description: A drop from killing creepers. This can be used to brew potions.

name: Pearl
description: A rare drop from a rare monster. It emit a strange power towards the sky.

name: Stone
description: A hard material. Can be used to make somewhat good tools.

name: Stone Pickaxe
description: A somewhat reliable pickaxe. It can mine slightly more stuff.

name: Stone Sword
description: A somewhat reliable sword. Don't expect it to kill many mobs.

name: Stone Axe
description: A somewhat reliable axe. It can be used to chop some trees.

name: Apple
description: A common fruit that hangs on trees. It is known to give humanity crazy wisdom like gravity, but it also was kind of a trap in ancient times.

name: Orange
description: A common fruit that hangs on trees. Although the emoji is called `tangerine`, I refuse to use that word. Too hard to spell.

name: Cherries
description: A common fruit that hangs on trees. They're little, but I hate them.

name: Carrot
description: A vegetable that grows on the ground peko.

name: Bacon
description: A pretty cool looking slice of meat. Unfortunately, I've never tasted it.

name: Meat
description: It's meat. I don't know what else to say.

name: Chicken
description: Chicken's leg. Or poultry's leg. I just think of chicken when I first see this emoji. Chicken it is.

name: Golden Apple
description: Let's pretend this is gold for a sec. Or maybe you're George. Who knows.

name: Iron
description: A fairly modern material. It can be used to craft pretty good tools.

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: A pretty good pickaxe. It can mine some rare materials in the Overworld.

name: Iron Sword
description: A pretty good sword. It can slay more enemies.

name: Iron Axe
description: A pretty good axe. It can chop more trees.

name: Diamond
description: A rare material that shines brightly under the sun. It can be used to craft very good tools that last even longer.

name: Diamond Pickaxe
description: A good pickaxe that can mine more things and last even longer.

name: Diamond Sword
description: A good sword that can slay even more enemies and last even longer.

name: Diamond Axe
description: A good axe that can chop a lot more trees and last even longer.

name: Obsidian
description: A volcanic glass that's hard to mine. They seems to give a mysterious energy linked to the underground.

name: Bed
description: Despite its look, a bed can be used to effectively mine things in certain locations.

name: Overworld Ticket
description: A one-way ticket to the surface of the World.

name: Nether Ticket
description: A one-way ticket to the underworld.

name: End Ticket
description: A one-way ticket to the middle of nowhere.

name: Redstone
description: A common red rock that can be used as a basic brewing ingredient.

name: Dry Leaf
description: Leaf that are in the Nether. They hold no water so they're barely alive and hanging on.

name: Mushroom
description: A body of fungus that grows randomly in the Nether. It's safe to eat.

name: Gold
description: A shiny material in the underworld. It can be used to barter many rare resources.

name: Magma Cream
description: A slimy ball dropped from creepy cubes.

name: Nether Respawner
description: When in your inventory, this allows you to stay in the Nether after your death. After each death in the Nether, this will be reduced by 1, skipping the usual penalty.

name: Blaze Rod
description: A fire stick so hot it is used as a fuel to brew potions.

name: Ancient Debris
description: A fragment of what was once the toughest metal in the world.

name: Netherite
description: The toughest metal in the world after being restored to its prime quality. It is said that this material is fire-proof.

name: Netherite Pickaxe
description: A very good pickaxe that can mine anything in this world.

name: Netherite Sword
description: A very good sword that can slays many more enemies in existence, including some larger and more dangerous ones.

name: Netherite Axe
description: A very good axe that can chop a lot more trees. Sounds kinda boring right?

name: Nether Star
description: A strange item that only drops from a dangerous mob in the Nether.

name: Space Rock
description: A rock from space, possibly a remnant of planets.

name: Star Fragment
description: A fragment of what was once a star.

name: Comet Fragment
description: A fragment of a comet. It stores some mysterious energy in it.

name: Star Gem
description: A gem created after assembling its fragments. It holds quite some power.

name: Star Pickaxe (Fragile)
description: A fragile pickaxe made from the power of the star, which allows you to get rare drops more often. It doesn't last very long.

name: Star Sword (Fragile)
description: A fragile sword made from the power of the star, which allows you to get rare drops more often. It doesn't last very long.

name: Star Axe (Fragile)
description: A fragile axe made from the power of the star, which allows you to get rare drops more often. It doesn't last very long.

name: Streak Freezer
description: When in your inventory, this will negate one missed day of your daily streak. This will be consumed even if you can't negate the streak loss fully.

name: Shulker Box
description: When in your inventory, this will create an extra space for storing items that won't be removed upon death.

name: Fire Potion
description: A potion that can save you in the Nether in case you're not careful with the environment there.

name: Haste Potion
description: A potion that increases your mining and chopping drops.

name: Fortune Potion
description: A potion that multiplies your mining drops.

name: Nature Potion
description: A potion that multiplies your chopping drops.

name: Strength Potion
description: A potion that increases your exploring drops.

name: Looting Potion
description: A potion that multiplies your exploring drops.

name: Luck Potion
description: From combining the power from some other potions, this potion significantly boost your luck, meaning you'll get more drops and less death.

name: Undying Potion
description: The result of a secret research to achieve immortality. This potion is deemed to cheat death.
